Branch.description:
The repository branch that Terraform will execute from.
Default to `master`.

Identifier.description:
A reference to your VCS repository in the format
`:org/:repo` where `:org` and `:repo` refer to the organization and repository
in your VCS provider.

IngressSubmodules.description:
Whether submodules should be fetched when
cloning the VCS repository. Defaults to `false`.

OauthTokenId.description:
Token ID of the VCS Connection (OAuth Conection Token)
to use.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AutoApply.description:
Whether to automatically apply changes when a
Terraform plan is successful. Defaults to `false`.

FileTriggersEnabled.description: Whether to filter runs based on the changed files in a VCS push. If enabled, the working directory and trigger prefixes describe a set of paths which must contain changes for a VCS push to trigger a run. If disabled, any push will trigger a run. Defaults to `true`.

Operations.description:
Whether to use remote execution mode. When set
to `false`, the workspace will be used for state storage only.
Defaults to `true`.

QueueAllRuns.description:
Whether all runs should be queued. When set
to `false`, runs triggered by a VCS change will not be queued until at least
one run is manually queued. Defaults to `true`.

SshKeyId.description: The ID of an SSH key to assign to the workspace.

TerraformVersion.description: The version of Terraform to use for this workspace. Defaults to the latest available version.

TriggerPrefixes.description: List of repository-root-relative paths which describe all locations to be tracked for changes.

WorkingDirectory.description:
A relative path that Terraform will execute
within.  Defaults to the root of your repository.
